title: uru tuNaiyAi ninru
sahitya:
uru tuNaiyAi ninru udavi varuvAi enrum maruda malai uraiyum murugA enakkini


anupallavi

  karaindurugavE undan tiru nAmattaik-karudi perum hita vAzhvai nAn peravum nalamuravum


caraNam    toDarum tolvinaiyin tollaigaL nIngavum iDarurAmal inimEl inba sukham Ongavum
koDai vaLLalE unnai aDaikkalam aDaiyumennai kaDaittETriDavE karuNai kUrnduDanE
